summary.span: 表示句柄资源的包装类。

span.span: Represents a wrapper class for handle resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是类似于类，不同之处在于实现引用计数。The class is similar to the class, except that implements reference counting. 可以使用而不是来解决性能问题的详细信息提供必要的同步时有效地自己。You can use instead of to address performance considerations when you can provide the necessary synchronization more efficiently yourself. 因为类不会执行引用计数，它不提供从句柄回收安全攻击的保护。Because the class does not perform reference counting, it does not provide protection from handle recycling security attacks. 由于引用计数算法隐式序列化操作，也会丢失一定数量的线程安全。Because the reference counting algorithm implicitly serializes operations, a certain amount of thread safety is also lost. 如果您调用或方法而不是另一个线程上完成的操作是使用该句柄，或如果调用或同时在两个线程，从结果是不确定。If you call the or method while an operation that is using the handle is outstanding on another thread, or if you call or from two threads at the same time, the results are non-deterministic. 类仍提供有保证的关键终止类。The class still provides the guaranteed critical finalization provided by the class.

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

span.span: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 部分受信任的或透明代码不能使用此类。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 标记句柄，以便释放资源。

span.span: Marks the handle for releasing and freeing resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用或方法允许要释放的资源。Calling the or method allows the resources to be freed. 与不同类，这会始终直接执行，因为没有指示的其他线程正在使用此句柄没有引用计数。Unlike the class, this will always happen immediately since there is no reference count to indicate that other threads are using this handle. 因此，必须采用同步机制，以确保其安全地调用方法。Therefore, you must employ a synchronization mechanism to ensure it is safe to call the method. 尽管大多数类使用类不需要提供一个终结器，这有时很有必要 （例如，清空文件缓冲区或编写某些数据回发到内存中）。Although most classes that use the class do not need to provide a finalizer, this is sometimes necessary (for example, to flush out file buffers or to write some data back into memory). 在这种情况下，类可以提供了终结器，保证在运行之前关键终结器运行。In this case, the class can provide a finalizer that is guaranteed to run before the critical finalizer runs. 调用或方法完成后使用对象。Call the or method when you are finished using the object. 方法使中不可用状态的对象。The method leaves the object in an unusable state. **请注意**始终为调用或发布到最后一个引用之前对象。**Note** Always call or before you release your last reference to the object. 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

summary.span: 标记句柄，以便释放资源。

span.span: Marks the handle for releasing and freeing resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用或方法允许要释放的资源。Calling the or method allows the resources to be freed. 与不同类，这会始终直接执行，因为没有指示的其他线程正在使用此句柄没有引用计数。Unlike the class, this will always happen immediately since there is no reference count to indicate that other threads are using this handle. 因此，必须采用同步机制，以确保其安全地调用方法。Therefore, you must employ a synchronization mechanism to ensure it is safe to call the method. 尽管大多数类使用类不需要提供一个终结器，这有时很有必要 （例如，清空文件缓冲区或编写某些数据回发到内存中）。Although most classes that use the class do not need to provide a finalizer, this is sometimes necessary (for example, to flush out file buffers or to write some data back into memory). 在这种情况下，类可以提供了终结器，保证在运行之前关键终结器运行。In this case, the class can provide a finalizer that is guaranteed to run before the critical finalizer runs. 调用或方法完成后使用对象。Call the or method when you are finished using the object. 方法使中不可用状态的对象。The method leaves the object in an unusable state. **请注意**始终为调用或方法在发布到最后一个引用前对象。**Note** Always call the or method before you release your last reference to the object. 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class specifying whether to perform a normal dispose operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应永远不会显式调用方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`false`。You should never explicitly call the method with the `disposing` parameter set to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 释放与句柄关联的所有资源。

span.span: Frees all resources associated with the handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是为析构函数类。The method is the destructor for the class. 应用程序代码不应直接调用此方法。Application code should not call this method directly.

span.span: Specifies the handle to be wrapped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开不公开句柄 (即，派生类的外部)。Do not expose the handle publicly (that is, outside of the derived class).

public: property bool IsClosed { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示句柄是否已关闭。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the handle is closed.

value.span: 如果句柄已关闭，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the handle is closed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个值，该值指示是否对象的句柄将不再与本机资源关联。The method returns a value indicating whether the object's handle is no longer associated with a native resource. 这不同于定义属性，用于计算是否给定句柄将始终被视为无效。This differs from the definition of the property, which computes whether a given handle is always considered invalid. 方法将返回`true`在以下情况下的值：The method returns a `true` value in the following cases: - 调用方法。The method was called. - 方法或调用方法并不没有为任何引用其他线程上的对象。The method or method was called and there are no references to the object on other threads.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsInvalid As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsInvalid { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，该值指示句柄值是否无效。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the handle value is invalid.

value.span: 如果句柄无效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the handle is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类必须实现属性，以便公共语言运行时能够确定是否需要关键完成。Derived classes must implement the property so that the common language runtime can determine whether critical finalization is required. 派生的类必须提供适合它们支持的句柄的常规类型的实现 （0 或-1 是无效的）。Derived classes must provide an implementation that suits the general type of handle they support (0 or -1 is invalid). 这些类可以再进一步派生特定的安全句柄类型。These classes can then be further derived for specific safe handle types. 与不同属性，用于报告是否对象已完成使用基础句柄，属性计算是否给定句柄值将始终被视为无效。Unlike the property, which reports whether the object has finished using the underlying handle, the property calculates whether the given handle value is always considered invalid. 因此，属性始终返回相同的值的任何一个句柄值。Therefore, the property always returns the same value for any one handle value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ReleaseHandle() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function ReleaseHandle () As Boolean

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，执行释放句柄所需的代码。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, executes the code required to free the handle.

returns.span: 如果句柄释放成功，则为 ；如果出现灾难性故障，则为 。

span.span: if the handle is released successfully; otherwise, in the event of a catastrophic failure, .

returns.span: 在这种情况下，它会生成 releaseHandleFailed 托管调试助手。

span.span: In this case, it generates a releaseHandleFailed Managed Debugging Assistant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法保证将只调用一次，前提是您使用正确的同步机制来确保只有一个调用或方法发生。The method is guaranteed to be called only once, provided that you employ proper synchronization mechanisms to ensure that only one call to the or method is made. 方法将不会调用，如果或属性是`true`。The method will not be called if the or property is `true`. 实现此方法在你派生类，以执行释放句柄所需的任何代码。Implement this method in your derived classes to execute any code that is required to free the handle. 因为的函数之一是要保证防止资源泄漏中的实现代码必须永远不会失败。Because one of the functions of is to guarantee prevention of resource leaks, the code in your implementation of must never fail. 垃圾回收器调用后正常的终结器已运行的对象进行垃圾回收的同时，并保证资源调用它并不将会中断时它正在进行中。The garbage collector calls after normal finalizers have been run for objects that were garbage collected at the same time, and guarantees the resources to invoke it and that it will not be interrupted while it is in progress. 此方法将准备作为受约束的执行区域 (CER) 中，在实例构造时 （以及其静态确定的调用关系图中的所有方法） 中。This method will be prepared as a constrained execution region (CER) at instance construction time (along with all the methods in its statically determinable call graph). 尽管这可防止线程中止中断，你仍必须小心以免引入中被重写任何错误路径方法。Although this prevents thread abort interrupts, you must still be careful not to introduce any fault paths in your overridden method. 具体而言，适用属性从调用任何方法为。In particular, apply the attribute to any methods you call from . 在大多数情况下应为此代码：In most cases this code should be: `ReliabilityContract(Consistency.WillNotCorruptState, Cer.Success)` 此外，对于简单的清理 (例如，调用 Win32 API`CloseHandle`上的文件句柄) 的单一平台调用中，可以检查返回值。Additionally, for simple cleanup (for example, calling the Win32 API `CloseHandle` on a file handle) you can check the return value for the single platform invoke call. 对于复杂清理，可能有大量程序逻辑和很多方法调用，其中一些可能会失败。For complex cleanup, you may have a lot of program logic and many method calls, some of which might fail. 您必须确保应用程序逻辑的这种情况下每个具有回退的代码。You must ensure that your program logic has fallback code for each of those cases. 如果方法将返回`false`出于任何原因，它将生成[releaseHandleFailed](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/releasehandlefailed-mda.md)托管调试助手。If the method returns `false` for any reason, it generates a [releaseHandleFailed](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/releasehandlefailed-mda.md) Managed Debugging Assistant.

related.span: 使用托管调试助手诊断运行时错误

span.span: Diagnosing Run-time Errors with Managed Debugging Assistants
ReleaseHandleFailed

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void SetHandle(native int handle) cil managed

param.name: handle
param.span: 要使用的预先存在的句柄。

span.span: The pre-existing handle to use.

summary.span: 将句柄设置为预先存在的指定句柄。

span.span: Sets the handle to the specified pre-existing handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法仅在需要以支持预先存在的句柄 （例如，如果在结构中返回的句柄），因为.NET Framework COM 互操作基础结构不支持封送处理结构中。Use the method only if you need to support a pre-existing handle (for example, if the handle is returned in a structure) because the .NET Framework COM interop infrastructure does not support marshaling handles in a structure.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetHandleAsInvalid() cil managed

span.span: Marks a handle as invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法仅当你知道你句柄无效，并且你想要这种情况下将其标记时。Call the method only when you know that your handle is invalid and you want to mark it as such. 执行此操作不会更改的值字段; 它仅将标记为无效的句柄。Doing so does not change the value of the field; it only marks the handle as invalid. 然后，句柄可能包含可能已失效。The handle might then contain a potentially stale value. 此调用的效果是不进行任何尝试释放资源。The effect of this call is that no attempt is made to free the resources. 如同方法，请使用仅当你需要支持预先存在的句柄。As with the method, use only if you need to support a pre-existing handle.
